circumstances: En route by night from Austin to Houston, the pilot encountered poor weather conditions and decided to continue. Later, the twin engine airplane struck tree tops and crashed near Giddings. The aircraft was destroyed by impact forces and both occupants were killed.
probable_cause:
Collision with trees in normal cruise due to improper in-flight decisions on part of the pilot. The following contributing factors were reported:
- Continued VFR flight into adverse weather conditions, 
- High obstructions, 
- Low ceiling, 
- Fog,
- Thunderstorm activity, 
- Flew into known poor weather conditions.
